<a id="SplitContainer"></a>

# SplitContainer

**Inherits:** [Container](Container.md) **\<** [Control](Control.md) **\<** [CanvasItem](CanvasItem.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

**Inherited By:** [HSplitContainer](HSplitContainer.md), [VSplitContainer](VSplitContainer.md)

A container that splits two child controls horizontally or vertically and provides a grabber for adjusting the split ratio.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A container that accepts only two child controls, then arranges them horizontally or vertically and creates a divisor between them. The divisor can be dragged around to change the size relation between the child controls.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Using Containers](../tutorials/ui/gui_containers.md)

## Enumerations

<a id="enum_SplitContainer_DraggerVisibility"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **DraggerVisibility**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_SplitContainer_DraggerVisibility)

<a id="SplitContainer_constant_DRAGGER_VISIBLE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[DraggerVisibility](SplitContainer.md#enum_SplitContainer_DraggerVisibility) **DRAGGER_VISIBLE** = `0`

The split dragger icon is always visible when [autohide](SplitContainer.md#SplitContainer_theme_constant_autohide) is ``false``, otherwise visible only when the cursor hovers it.

The size of the grabber icon determines the minimum [separation](SplitContainer.md#SplitContainer_theme_constant_separation).

The dragger icon is automatically hidden if the length of the grabber icon is longer than the split bar.<a id="SplitContainer_constant_DRAGGER_HIDDEN"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[DraggerVisibility](SplitContainer.md#enum_SplitContainer_DraggerVisibility) **DRAGGER_HIDDEN** = `1`

The split dragger icon is never visible regardless of the value of [autohide](SplitContainer.md#SplitContainer_theme_constant_autohide).

The size of the grabber icon determines the minimum [separation](SplitContainer.md#SplitContainer_theme_constant_separation).<a id="SplitContainer_constant_DRAGGER_HIDDEN_COLLAPSED"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[DraggerVisibility](SplitContainer.md#enum_SplitContainer_DraggerVisibility) **DRAGGER_HIDDEN_COLLAPSED** = `2`

The split dragger icon is not visible, and the split bar is collapsed to zero thickness.<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="SplitContainer_property_collapsed"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **collapsed** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#SplitContainer_property_collapsed)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_collapsed**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_collapsed**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the dragger will be disabled and the children will be sized as if the [split_offset](SplitContainer.md#SplitContainer_property_split_offset) was ``0``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SplitContainer_property_drag_area_highlight_in_editor"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **drag_area_highlight_in_editor** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#SplitContainer_property_drag_area_highlight_in_editor)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_drag_area_highlight_in_editor**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_drag_area_highlight_in_editor_enabled**\ (\ )

Highlights the drag area [Rect2](Rect2.md) so you can see where it is during development. The drag area is gold if [dragging_enabled](SplitContainer.md#SplitContainer_property_dragging_enabled) is ``true``, and red if ``false``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SplitContainer_property_drag_area_margin_begin"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **drag_area_margin_begin** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#SplitContainer_property_drag_area_margin_begin)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_drag_area_margin_begin**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_drag_area_margin_begin**\ (\ )

Reduces the size of the drag area and split bar [split_bar_background](SplitContainer.md#SplitContainer_theme_style_split_bar_background) at the beginning of the container.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SplitContainer_property_drag_area_margin_end"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **drag_area_margin_end** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#SplitContainer_property_drag_area_margin_end)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_drag_area_margin_end**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_drag_area_margin_end**\ (\ )

Reduces the size of the drag area and split bar [split_bar_background](SplitContainer.md#SplitContainer_theme_style_split_bar_background) at the end of the container.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SplitContainer_property_drag_area_offset"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **drag_area_offset** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#SplitContainer_property_drag_area_offset)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_drag_area_offset**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_drag_area_offset**\ (\ )

Shifts the drag area in the axis of the container to prevent the drag area from overlapping the [ScrollBar](ScrollBar.md) or other selectable [Control](Control.md) of a child node.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SplitContainer_property_dragger_visibility"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[DraggerVisibility](SplitContainer.md#enum_SplitContainer_DraggerVisibility) **dragger_visibility** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#SplitContainer_property_dragger_visibility)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_dragger_visibility**\ (\ value\: [DraggerVisibility](SplitContainer.md#enum_SplitContainer_DraggerVisibility)\ )
- [DraggerVisibility](SplitContainer.md#enum_SplitContainer_DraggerVisibility) **get_dragger_visibility**\ (\ )

Determines the dragger's visibility. This property does not determine whether dragging is enabled or not. Use [dragging_enabled](SplitContainer.md#SplitContainer_property_dragging_enabled) for that.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SplitContainer_property_dragging_enabled"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **dragging_enabled** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#SplitContainer_property_dragging_enabled)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_dragging_enabled**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_dragging_enabled**\ (\ )

Enables or disables split dragging.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SplitContainer_property_split_offset"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **split_offset** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#SplitContainer_property_split_offset)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_split_offset**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_split_offset**\ (\ )

The initial offset of the splitting between the two [Control](Control.md)\\ s, with ``0`` being at the end of the first [Control](Control.md).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SplitContainer_property_touch_dragger_enabled"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **touch_dragger_enabled** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#SplitContainer_property_touch_dragger_enabled)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_touch_dragger_enabled**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_touch_dragger_enabled**\ (\ )

If ``true``, a touch-friendly drag handle will be enabled for better usability on smaller screens. Unlike the standard grabber, this drag handle overlaps the **SplitContainer**'s children and does not affect their minimum separation. The standard grabber will no longer be drawn when this option is enabled.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SplitContainer_property_vertical"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **vertical** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#SplitContainer_property_vertical)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_vertical**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_vertical**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the **SplitContainer** will arrange its children vertically, rather than horizontally.

Can't be changed when using [HSplitContainer](HSplitContainer.md) and [VSplitContainer](VSplitContainer.md).

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="SplitContainer_method_clamp_split_offset"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **clamp_split_offset**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SplitContainer_method_clamp_split_offset)

Clamps the [split_offset](SplitContainer.md#SplitContainer_property_split_offset) value to not go outside the currently possible minimal and maximum values.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SplitContainer_method_get_drag_area_control"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Control](Control.md) **get_drag_area_control**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SplitContainer_method_get_drag_area_control)

Returns the drag area [Control](Control.md). For example, you can move a pre-configured button into the drag area [Control](Control.md) so that it rides along with the split bar. Try setting the [Button](Button.md) anchors to ``center`` prior to the ``reparent()`` call.

```
    $BarnacleButton.reparent($SplitContainer.get_drag_area_control())
```


\ **Note:** The drag area [Control](Control.md) is drawn over the **SplitContainer**'s children, so [CanvasItem](CanvasItem.md) draw objects called from the [Control](Control.md) and children added to the [Control](Control.md) will also appear over the **SplitContainer**'s children. Try setting [Control.mouse_filter](Control.md#Control_property_mouse_filter) of custom children to [Control.MOUSE_FILTER_IGNORE](Control.md#Control_constant_MOUSE_FILTER_IGNORE) to prevent blocking the mouse from dragging if desired.

\ **Warning:** This is a required internal node, removing and freeing it may cause a crash.

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Theme Property Descriptions

<a id="SplitContainer_theme_color_touch_dragger_color"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Color](Color.md) **touch_dragger_color** = `Color(1, 1, 1, 0.3)` [ðŸ”—](#SplitContainer_theme_color_touch_dragger_color)

The color of the touch dragger.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SplitContainer_theme_color_touch_dragger_hover_color"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Color](Color.md) **touch_dragger_hover_color** = `Color(1, 1, 1, 0.6)` [ðŸ”—](#SplitContainer_theme_color_touch_dragger_hover_color)

The color of the touch dragger when hovered.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SplitContainer_theme_color_touch_dragger_pressed_color"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Color](Color.md) **touch_dragger_pressed_color** = `Color(1, 1, 1, 1)` [ðŸ”—](#SplitContainer_theme_color_touch_dragger_pressed_color)

The color of the touch dragger when pressed.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SplitContainer_theme_constant_autohide"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[int](int.md) **autohide** = `1` [ðŸ”—](#SplitContainer_theme_constant_autohide)

Boolean value. If ``1`` (``true``), the grabber will hide automatically when it isn't under the cursor. If ``0`` (``false``), it's always visible. The [dragger_visibility](SplitContainer.md#SplitContainer_property_dragger_visibility) must be [DRAGGER_VISIBLE](SplitContainer.md#SplitContainer_constant_DRAGGER_VISIBLE).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SplitContainer_theme_constant_minimum_grab_thickness"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[int](int.md) **minimum_grab_thickness** = `6` [ðŸ”—](#SplitContainer_theme_constant_minimum_grab_thickness)

The minimum thickness of the area users can click on to grab the split bar. This ensures that the split bar can still be dragged if [separation](SplitContainer.md#SplitContainer_theme_constant_separation) or [h_grabber](SplitContainer.md#SplitContainer_theme_icon_h_grabber) / [v_grabber](SplitContainer.md#SplitContainer_theme_icon_v_grabber)'s size is too narrow to easily select.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SplitContainer_theme_constant_separation"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[int](int.md) **separation** = `12` [ðŸ”—](#SplitContainer_theme_constant_separation)

The split bar thickness, i.e., the gap between the two children of the container. This is overridden by the size of the grabber icon if [dragger_visibility](SplitContainer.md#SplitContainer_property_dragger_visibility) is set to [DRAGGER_VISIBLE](SplitContainer.md#SplitContainer_constant_DRAGGER_VISIBLE), or [DRAGGER_HIDDEN](SplitContainer.md#SplitContainer_constant_DRAGGER_HIDDEN), and [separation](SplitContainer.md#SplitContainer_theme_constant_separation) is smaller than the size of the grabber icon in the same axis.

\ **Note:** To obtain [separation](SplitContainer.md#SplitContainer_theme_constant_separation) values less than the size of the grabber icon, for example a ``1 px`` hairline, set [h_grabber](SplitContainer.md#SplitContainer_theme_icon_h_grabber) or [v_grabber](SplitContainer.md#SplitContainer_theme_icon_v_grabber) to a new [ImageTexture](ImageTexture.md), which effectively sets the grabber icon size to ``0 px``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SplitContainer_theme_icon_grabber"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **grabber** [ðŸ”—](#SplitContainer_theme_icon_grabber)

The icon used for the grabber drawn in the middle area. This is only used in [HSplitContainer](HSplitContainer.md) and [VSplitContainer](VSplitContainer.md). For **SplitContainer**, see [h_grabber](SplitContainer.md#SplitContainer_theme_icon_h_grabber) and [v_grabber](SplitContainer.md#SplitContainer_theme_icon_v_grabber) instead.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SplitContainer_theme_icon_h_grabber"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **h_grabber** [ðŸ”—](#SplitContainer_theme_icon_h_grabber)

The icon used for the grabber drawn in the middle area when [vertical](SplitContainer.md#SplitContainer_property_vertical) is ``false``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SplitContainer_theme_icon_h_touch_dragger"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **h_touch_dragger** [ðŸ”—](#SplitContainer_theme_icon_h_touch_dragger)

The icon used for the drag handle when [touch_dragger_enabled](SplitContainer.md#SplitContainer_property_touch_dragger_enabled) is ``true`` and [vertical](SplitContainer.md#SplitContainer_property_vertical) is ``false``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SplitContainer_theme_icon_touch_dragger"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **touch_dragger** [ðŸ”—](#SplitContainer_theme_icon_touch_dragger)

The icon used for the drag handle when [touch_dragger_enabled](SplitContainer.md#SplitContainer_property_touch_dragger_enabled) is ``true``. This is only used in [HSplitContainer](HSplitContainer.md) and [VSplitContainer](VSplitContainer.md). For **SplitContainer**, see [h_touch_dragger](SplitContainer.md#SplitContainer_theme_icon_h_touch_dragger) and [v_touch_dragger](SplitContainer.md#SplitContainer_theme_icon_v_touch_dragger) instead.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SplitContainer_theme_icon_v_grabber"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **v_grabber** [ðŸ”—](#SplitContainer_theme_icon_v_grabber)

The icon used for the grabber drawn in the middle area when [vertical](SplitContainer.md#SplitContainer_property_vertical) is ``true``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SplitContainer_theme_icon_v_touch_dragger"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **v_touch_dragger** [ðŸ”—](#SplitContainer_theme_icon_v_touch_dragger)

The icon used for the drag handle when [touch_dragger_enabled](SplitContainer.md#SplitContainer_property_touch_dragger_enabled) is ``true`` and [vertical](SplitContainer.md#SplitContainer_property_vertical) is ``true``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SplitContainer_theme_style_split_bar_background"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[StyleBox](StyleBox.md) **split_bar_background** [ðŸ”—](#SplitContainer_theme_style_split_bar_background)

Determines the background of the split bar if its thickness is greater than zero.
